Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: tabPosition
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Defines the location of the Tab Bar.

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: barVerticalAlignment
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Defines the vertical alignment of the Tab Bar.

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: barHorizontalAlignment
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Defines the horizontal alignment of the Tab Bar.

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: tabSet
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Holds the collection of tabs being presented.

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: init()
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Creates a new instance of the object.

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: init(tabPosition:barVerticalAlignment:barHorizontalAlignment:)
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Creates a new instance of the object with the given properties

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: body
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Generates the body of the Tab Bar and the contents of the currently selected tab.

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: tab(_:)
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Adds a new tab to the Tab Bar.

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.name: tab(title:icon:tag:content:)
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html#/s:19Mu.abstract: Adds a new tab to the bar with the given properties.

Structs/MultiplatformTab.html#/s:19Multi.name: tag
Structs/MultiplatformTab.html#/s:19Multi.abstract: An optional, unique tag for the tab.

Structs/MultiplatformTab.html#/s:19Multi.name: contents
Structs/MultiplatformTab.html#/s:19Multi.abstract: The SwiftUI content for the page body displayed when this tab is selected.

Structs/MultiplatformTab.html#/s:19Multi.name: init(title:icon:tag:contents:)
Structs/MultiplatformTab.html#/s:19Multi.abstract: Creates a new instance of the object.

Structs/MultiplatformTab.html#/s:19Multi.name: body
Structs/MultiplatformTab.html#/s:19Multi.abstract: Draws the tab in the tab bar.

Structs/MultiplatformTab.html.name: MultiplatformTab
Structs/MultiplatformTab.html.abstract: Holds the data for a tab that can be added to the MultiplatformTabBar control.

Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html.name: MultiplatformTabBar
Structs/MultiplatformTabBar.html.abstract: Creates a common Tab Bar control that runs and looks the same across multiple devices and OS (iOS, iPadOS, macOS & tvOS).

Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html#.name: top
Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html#.abstract: Place Tabs at the top of the screen.

Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html#.name: bottom
Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html#.abstract: Place Tabs at the bottom of the screen.

Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html#.name: left
Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html#.abstract: Place Tabs on the left side of the screen.

Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html#.name: right
Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html#.abstract: Place tabs on the right side of the screen.

Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html.name: MultiplatformTabViewPosition
Enums/MultiplatformTabViewPosition.html.abstract: Defines the position that the Tab Bar is drawn in.

Classes/MultiplatformTabCollection.html.name: MultiplatformTabCollection
Classes/MultiplatformTabCollection.html.abstract: Holds the collection of MultiplatformTabs that will be displayed in a MultiplatformTabBar.
